item.description:
Mama Kicks has been around for quite a while and she gets the place hopping, this restuarant has excellant food, great service and there is also a lounge with a few huge TV's for viewing. The parking lot is huge so plenty of space. All we need is people to come out and join in a fun filled night out.

Ginette I am throwing this gathering cause you are such a sweety, save room for dessert!!! Yes a Birthday cake and ballons!!! Its your celebration, I know I cannot keep things a secret cause you are a member of every group,LOL...So come out and join us all you fun folks.

Mama Kicks is New Hampshire's # 1 Party Band. Four talented musicians performing a diverse mix of classic rock, blues and simply great dance tunes. Featuring Lisa Guyer, arguably the most talented female vocalist around.

There will also be another Meet Up group joining us, I will be hosting for them as well, the more the merrier.


Party will start at 7pm for dinner and the band starts at 9 pm.

Please put in your RSVP if you plan to have dinner by 1/22/11- 5 pm, there are no more Maybe options but you can always include it in your reply, but be firm about dinner because I am making reservations.
I will have Meet Up signs posted on the tables when you enter the dining area, and I will inform the hostess where you can find us just mention Meet Up.

I also ask that you be responsible for your own service checks.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Rock on to "Mama Kicks" Dinner/Dancing/Happy Birthday Ginette!
